members.name: Dr. Amara Okonkwo
members.title: Executive Director
members.bio: With over 15 years of experience in nonprofit leadership, Dr. Okonkwo leads FEESOS's strategic vision and operations.
members.bioFr: Avec plus de 15 ans d'experience dans le leadership associatif, Dr. Okonkwo dirige la vision strategique et les operations de FEESOS.

members.name: Michael Thompson
members.title: Director of Programs
members.bio: Michael oversees all FEESOS programs, ensuring they create meaningful and sustainable impact across Africa.
members.bioFr: Michael supervise tous les programmes de FEESOS, s'assurant qu'ils creent un impact significatif et durable a travers l'Afrique.

members.name: Fatou Diallo
members.title: Community Outreach Manager
members.bio: Fatou builds bridges between FEESOS and communities across Africa, fostering partnerships and local engagement.
members.bioFr: Fatou cree des liens entre FEESOS et les communautes a travers l'Afrique, favorisant les partenariats et l'engagement local.

members.name: James Mensah
members.title: Finance & Operations
members.bio: James ensures FEESOS operates with financial integrity and efficiency, maximizing the impact of every donation.
members.bioFr: James veille a ce que FEESOS fonctionne avec integrite financiere et efficacite, maximisant l'impact de chaque don.
